message: fix(iot-dev): Fix issue where amqp layer didn't recognize an ack to a subscription message that it sent (#778)

added: * @param subscriptionMessageRequestSentCallback the callback to fire each time a subscription message is sent

public AmqpsSessionDeviceOperation(final DeviceClientConfig deviceClientConfig, AmqpsDeviceAuthentication amqpsDeviceAuthentication, SubscriptionMessageRequestSentCallback subscriptionMessageRequestSentCallback) throws IllegalArgumentException
deleted: public AmqpsSessionDeviceOperation(final DeviceClientConfig deviceClientConfig, AmqpsDeviceAuthentication amqpsDeviceAuthentication) throws IllegalArgumentException
